alert.note: Alert for Dallam; Hansford; Hartley; Ochiltree; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 15 at 2:21AM CST until December 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE EASTERN OKLAHOMA PANHANDLE AND NORTH CENTRAL TEXAS PANHANDLE... * Affected Area...In Oklahoma...Cimarron...Texas and Beaver. In Texas...Dallam...Sherman...Hansford...Ochiltree and Hartley. * 20 Foot Winds...Southwest 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 8 percent. * Red Flag Threat Index...Values between 3 and 7 are expected across a majority of the Panhandles, with values of 8 possible in the Oklahoma and northern Texas Panhandles. * Timing...Wednesday morning through the late afternoon hours.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures will create favorable weather for rapid fire growth and spread. Avoid activities that promote open flames and sparks.
